channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15471] Add num calls in priority and general queue to RS UI
item.description: 1.2 added the queue size. We should add the number of calls in the queue.
item.summary: Add num calls in priority and general queue to RS UI

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Nice to have but never gotten to it, pushing to 1.4, if someone has time to work on it now please feel free to move it back to 1.3.
We should make the new titles "Length" so that size is size in bytes and length is number of calls in the queue.

-1 overall
